import React,{ useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' export const CreateActivity = ()=>{ let $countries = useSelector((state)=>state.countries) let [act, setAct] = useState({ name:'', difficulty:'', duration:'', season:'', countries:[] }) console.log($countries) return( <>
Activity create











{$countries.map((el)=><>{el.name}

)}



) }
